title: Townhill Loch Country Park - Dunfermline Walks

images.title: Ian Mitchell / Townhill Loch
images.caption: Townhill Loch. The loch is the home of the Scottish National Water Ski Centre.

images.title: Weir on the Town Loch,in Townhill . by edward mcmaihin, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Weir on the Town Loch,in Townhill .

description: This country park is located in Dunfermline and is very popular with water-skiers. However there are also walking trails alongside Town Loch and a cycle trail on the eastern edge of the park. The loch is surrounded by some really pretty countryside and there are also facilities such as a children's play area and a croquet lawn. Just a couple of miles north east of the park there's some more peaceful lochside trails along Loch Fitty .
